name: invite
description: Get a link for inviting the bot.

name: ping
description: Check Yoki's latency.

name: support
description: Get a link for our support server.

name: userinfo
description: View information about a user or yourself.

name: antiraid
description: Configure the anti-raid module for this server.

subCommands.name: antiraid-challenge
subCommands.description: Set or view the response the bot takes when a user fails the age filter.

subCommands.name: antiraid-age
subCommands.description: Set or view the minimum account age requirement for users to be exempt from the antiraid.

subCommands.name: antiraid-channel
subCommands.description: Set or view the channel where users are presented with challenges if they fail the age filter.

name: filter
description: Configures content filtering.

subCommands.name: filter-add
subCommands.description: Add a word or phrase to the automod filter.

subCommands.name: filter-remove
subCommands.description: Remove a word or phrase from the automod filter.

subCommands.name: filter-list
subCommands.description: Lists every word or phrase that will be filtered by automod.

name: case
description: View info of a case.

name: history
description: Manages a user's history.

subCommands.name: history-view
subCommands.description: Get the list of moderation cases of a user.

subCommands.name: history-clear
subCommands.description: Clear the history of a user.

subCommands.name: history-all
subCommands.description: Gets the list of all moderation cases in this server.

name: ban
description: Ban a user.
examples: ?ban R40Mp0Wd Talking too much about Town of Salem

name: kick
description: Kick a user.
examples: ?kick R40Mp0Wd Talking too much about Town of Salem

name: mute
description: Mute a user for a specified amount of time (ex. 3h, 30m, 5d).
examples: ?mute R40Mp0Wd 1h Talking too much about Town of Salem

name: note
description: Adds an entry to someone's offence history without notifying them.

name: unmute
description: Removes a mute from the specified user.
examples: ?unmute R40Mp0Wd Stopped playing Town of Salem

name: warn
description: Warn a user.

name: modmail
description: Parent command for modmail related commands.
examples: ?modmail modmail reply Hi, what can I help you with?

subCommands.name: reply
subCommands.description: Reply in a modmail thread.
examples: Hello! What can I help you with?

subCommands.name: close
subCommands.description: Close a modmail thread. If ran in a modmail channel, it will close the thread associated with that channel. If a user is mentioned, it will force close the open thread for that user.

subCommands.name: modmail-edit
subCommands.description: Edit a message in a modmail thread.

subCommands.name: modmail-history
subCommands.description: View the modmail history for a user.

subCommands.name: modmail-selecttrigger
subCommands.description: Select a modmail thread trigger.

subCommands.name: modmail-sendtrigger
subCommands.description: Send a modmail thread trigger.

name: modules
description: Enable or disable a module for this server.

subCommands.name: module-enable
subCommands.description: Enable a module for this server.

subCommands.name: module-disable
subCommands.description: Disable a module.

subCommands.name: module-list
subCommands.description: List the modules enabled for this server.

name: preset
description: Parent command for preset related commands.

subCommands.name: preset-enable
subCommands.description: Enables a filter preset.

subCommands.name: preset-disable
subCommands.description: Disables a filter preset.

subCommands.name: preset-list
subCommands.description: List the presets enabled for this server, along with the presets Yoki offers.

name: tag
description: Parent command for tag related commands.
examples: ?tag add tag-1 this is the content for tag 1

subCommands.name: tag-add
subCommands.description: Add a custom tag.

subCommands.name: tag-remove
subCommands.description: Remove a custom tag.

subCommands.name: tag-list
subCommands.description: Get all the custom tags.

name: config
description: Set server-wide settings.
usage: <modrole | muterole | filteronmods | logchannel | modmailgroup | modmailcategory | threshold | spamfrequency | spaminfractions | urlwhitelist | linkseverity> <...args>

subCommands.name: config-modrole
subCommands.description: Add a mod role.

subCommands.name: config-muterole
subCommands.description: Set or view the mute role for this server.

subCommands.name: config-filteronmods
subCommands.description: Set or view whether mods are filtered on this server.

subCommands.name: config-logchannel
subCommands.description: Manage your log channels.

subCommands.name: logchannel-types
subCommands.description: List all possible Log Channel types.

subCommands.name: logchannel-list
subCommands.description: List all possible Log Channel types.

subCommands.name: logchannel-set
subCommands.description: Subscribe a specified channel to a specified log type.

subCommands.name: logchannel-remove
subCommands.description: Unsubscribe a specified channel from a specified log type.

subCommands.name: config-modmailgroup
subCommands.description: Set the modmail group where new channels are created.

subCommands.name: config-modmailcategory
subCommands.description: Set the category where new modmail channels are created.

subCommands.name: config-threshold
subCommands.description: Sets how many infraction points are required for each level of moderation severity.

subCommands.name: config-spamfrequency
subCommands.description: Sets required message count to activate the spam filter.

subCommands.name: config-spaminfractions
subCommands.description: Set how many infraction points a user will get if they spam.

subCommands.name: link-url-urlwhitelist
subCommands.description: Sets whether the URL filter is whitelisted or blacklisted.

subCommands.name: link-url-linkseverity
subCommands.description: Sets severity and infraction points of non-whitelisted links.

name: prefix
description: Set or view the prefix of this server.

name: link
description: Manages domain blacklists and invite whitelists.

subCommands.name: link-url
subCommands.description: Manages domain blacklists.

subCommands.name: link-url-add
subCommands.description: Add a domain to the __blacklist__.

subCommands.name: link-url-remove
subCommands.description: Removes a domain from the __blacklist__.

subCommands.name: link-invite
subCommands.description: Manages invite whitelist.

subCommands.name: link-invite-add
subCommands.description: Add a vanity url to the invite __whitelist__.

subCommands.name: link-invite-remove
subCommands.description: Removes a server from the __whitelist__.

subCommands.name: link-list
subCommands.description: Lists every link domain that is blacklisted.
